congruification • time tree • megaphylogeny • MEE • Jon Eastman • Luke Harmon

Congruification paper published.

By Chris Hamilton March 15, 2013 April 08, 2013 Tweet Like +1

Our method for time scaling large phylogenetic trees has been published in Methods in Ecology and Evolution. This is also the code behind the DateLife project - a Phylotastic product.

Eastman, JM, LJ Harmon, and DC Tank. 2013. Congruification: support for time scaling large phylogenetic trees. Methods in Ecology and Evolution 4: 688â€“691.
